p: In the initial crystal structure of the MNV P domain [ 19], the outer two loops (A’–B’ and E’–F’) displayed two discreet conformations; a closed structure where the two loops are tightly associated and an open structure where the loops are splayed apart. This conformational difference is shown in Figure 6, Figure 7 and Figure 8. This “open” and “closed” designation will be used in the following discussion.
